title: Tommy Sheppard – 2022 Comments on Independence Referendum
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Tommy Sheppard, the SNP MP for Edinburgh East, on 24 June 2022.
content:
Six years ago today, Scotland voted overwhelmingly to remain in the EU but was dragged out against our will.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

It was democratically indefensible then, just as the Tories’ refusal to accept our mandate for #indyref2 is now. Scotland will be back soon.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
